transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Ji sir abhi bataye.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan madam.
Executive: Haan sir abhi aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ji main bol rahi thi sir abhi bataye aap abhi kya issue aa raha hai maine jab aapko aapne mujhe.
Customer: Nahi bas wohi bataya tha na aap keh rahe the aayegi lead to location nahi aa rahi tha.
Executive: Haan haan maine aapko order value wala dikha hi diya hai ki agar aap order value kam karke karoge to aapke paas aa jayengi. Aap ek baar check karo.
Maine aapko bataya tha na ki agar aap order value jyada kar rahe ho aur lead available nahi hai to nahi ho payega but agar order value mein lead available hai.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Within haan.
Customer: Main yeh keh raha tha yeh system pe system pe dalte hain main bhi khud search karta hu IndiaMART pe bete hamara naam hi nahi aata main yeh keh raha tha aapko.
Executive: Aapka naam nahi aata?
Customer: Hamara haan jab main khud search karta hu maan lo.
Executive: Actually jab meri aapke son se baat hui thi to woh bata rahe the ki jo aapki company abhi listed hai isse previously koi company thi jisme abhi aapne band kar diya hai apni new wali list karai hui hai right?
Customer: Haan new wali haan.
Executive: Haan to abhi ki woh purane wala bhi abhi show kar raha hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Maine yeh baat apni team ko aage forward bhi kar di do baar maine forward kar di maine aapke bete ko bhi bata diya unko maine screenshot bhi share kar diya with proof ki sir maine kar diya hai unhone kaha ki mam abhi koi resolution iska hua nahi hai. To maine kaha theek hai main dobara se kar dungi because jo mere aage jo team hai technical team hai unhone mujhe bataya hai ki jab dusri company list ho jati hai to kuch time mein jo previous wali hai woh automatically band ho jayegi dikhna. Aur woh bol rahe the ki google pe jab aap search karte ho to aapke sath sath purane wali bhi aati hai. But agar woh haan.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Woh abhi jaise aapko do month hue hain aapki is new wali firm ko chalte hue jo IndiaMART pe bhi laai hui hai hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Agar ek week tak aur nahi hota hai.
Customer: Purani wali purani wali list aise se to sahi ho jata kaam.
Executive: Kyunki list to sir new wali hogi na jo aapne abhi karai hai purani wali to band hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Usme to name bhi alag hai usme to number bhi alag hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jo number usme hai woh number isme nahi chal raha hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan to abhi main dekhti hu ek do din aur wait karti hu agar nahi hota hai tabhi waise to ho jana chahiye kyunki do month ho gaye hain to automatically ho jana chahiye. Maine unko mail karne ko bola tha woh bol rahe the ki woh mail unki side se ho nahi sakta. To main chalo apni side se try karti hu woh mail karne ka aur aapka issue sirf yahi tha na sir buyleads wala ki aap jaise connect kar rahe ho to show nahi kar raha hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ki not available dikha raha hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan abhi main aapke paas ya to aap apne bete se mera number le lena ya fir aap note kar lo next time se koi bhi issue hota hai aap mujhe direct call karna because yeh number jo jata hai yeh service center pe jata hai jo hamara service wala hai fir waha se mujhe ek long follow up karna padta hai long process follow karna padta hai. To better hai ki koi bhi issue ho raha hai to direct aap mujhe connect kar le agar call pe hota hai kabhi cheeze nahi samajh mein aati hai maine aapke sun ke sath bhi video meet arrange ki thi pehle abhi teen char din ki baat hai hamari baat hui thi. To abhi aap mujhe bataye aapka yeh resolution main apni side se close kar du sir?
Customer: Theek hai madam yahi baat kar raha tha.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Haan main apni side se close kar deti hu aur jo aapka concern hai woh aage main forward kar dungi update kar dungi to bas buyleads pe ek cheez ka focus karna aap yeh bataye ki aap desktop se dekhte ho ya phone se dekhte ho?
Customer: Desktop pe dekhta hu phone pe dikhai nahi deta.
Executive: Phone pe bhi ek app hai phone pe waise bhi koi fayda nahi hai phone pe aap tab dekh sakte ho jab aap bahar ho desktop ko desktop ko char cheeze jyada dikhata hai sir. Jo phone dikhayega woh desktop nahi dikhayega desktop usko jyada hi dikhayega phone pe kam cheeze available hai desktop pe jyada hai aap ab next time se kya karna har do se teen ghante mein aap na apne portal pe login karna usko dekhna freshly har cheez char ghante mein freshly hi aati hai. Aur jaise aapko do leads ek din mein aap teen lead consume karte honge jo aapko per hai aur ek aapko wali milti hai jaise aapko ek week ki 17 leads di hui hai allot ki hui hai to aap try kiya karo ki ek din mein teen to kar hi lo kyunki agar aap ek din mein teen nahi karoge to woh waste jayengi.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ek din mein beshak char kar lo lekin teen se to aap nahi karo woh aap fresh lead consume karoge aapko automatically dikhai degi abhi aapka koi pattern set nahi hua hai bulk lead agar aap consume karoge to woh automatically aapke paas fir bulk mein hi dikhayega aur location jaise aapki hai woh pan india hai sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Pan india mein theek hai chalo pan india wali hai chaliye to main apni side se concern close kar deti hu baki aage forward kar deti hu.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir okay sir thank you.
Customer: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Location not showing for buyleads.

- Old company listing still showing on IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Explained order value affects buylead availability.

- Assured old company listing issue will be resolved.

- Provided direct contact number for future issues.

- Advised to use desktop for better visibility.

- Advised to consume allocated leads daily.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will forward the concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, old listing, resolution, desktop, leads consumption
